item.title: COVID-19 Vaccination in India, Covishield and Covaxin
item.description: In January 2021 India started National Vaccination programme against the SARS-CoV-2 virus which has caused the COVID-19 pandemic. The drive prioritises healthcare and frontline workers, and then those over the age of 60, and then those over the age of 45 and suffering from certain comorbidities. In January 2021 Secretary-General of the United Nations Antonio Guterre
item.dc:creator: Karthik Kumar D K
